key_risks: Regulatory risks due to China's strict EdTech sector regulations
Profitability challenges from high R&D and marketing expenses
Dependence on NetEase for resources and technology
Intense competition in the Chinese EdTech market
controversies: Significant regulatory crackdowns on for-profit tutoring and advertising
social_issues: Impact of regulatory changes on educational accessibility
governance_issues: Operational dependence on NetEase limiting independence
